item.description:
The topic for this month's meetup is "Embracing the Power of the Heart" led by body psychotherapist, Linda Marks, MSM. Over the past two decades we have gained a much deeper understanding of the true nature of the heart, which is the first organ to form in the body. The heart contains extensive brain-like neural matter and sends electromagnetic and chemical information to balance and regulate the rest of the body. This "heartpower" can be harnessed for healing at emotional, physical and spiritual levels.

At the beginning of each meeting, we have a chance to get to know one another and our professional specialties. We share a potluck lunch, and then have a featured presenter share about his/her work

Let me know what you will bring for the potluck lunch when you RSVP.
item.how_to_find_us: We will welcome you when you arrive!
item.name: Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies October Meetup
